subtitle: You need foods in many colours
description: You need foods in many colours
title: Should I eat differently?
content:
Created by BabyCenter

Now that you are pregnant, it is important to try to eat well so your baby will grow well. You and your growing baby need lots of different nutrients. 

A simple way to think about it is to eat lots of different coloured foods! 

You could talk to your family about the foods you need.

Try to include some of each of these food types in your daily diet: 

 - 	Fruit and vegetables. These protect your baby from being born with a problem.

 - 	Starchy food. These include bread, rice, These include bread, rice, noodles, pumpkin and potatoes. These foods give you energy.

 - 	Food rich in protein These include eggs, dark green leafy vegetables, tofu, nuts, chicken, fish, and meat.  These are body building foods.

Calcium-rich and dairy foods. These include milk, soy milk, tofu and broccoli. They help your baby grow strong bones.
